name: Rustic Slate Charm
shortDescription: Raw slate look for outdoor aesthetics.
description: This tile features a rugged slate finish, making it ideal for patios, balconies, and garden paths.

name: Glossy Ocean Blue
shortDescription: Bright blue tiles for a spa-like feel.
description: High-gloss ceramic tiles in a cool ocean hue bring freshness to bathrooms and pool areas.

name: Desert Sandstone
shortDescription: Warm tones for a cozy interior.
description: Inspired by desert landscapes, this sandstone tile adds earthy warmth to your space.

name: Arctic White Porcelain
shortDescription: Crisp and clean look for any wall.
description: Porcelain tile with pure white tones and a smooth surface ideal for kitchens and bathrooms.

name: Midnight Concrete
shortDescription: Urban modern style in deep grey.
description: Concrete-inspired porcelain tile perfect for industrial-themed interiors or office spaces.

name: Pebble River Shine
description: This tile mimics smooth river pebbles and works great in bathrooms and spa zones.

name: Café Mocha Tile
shortDescription: Warm coffee tones for cozy vibes.
description: Great for kitchen backsplashes, this tile brings mocha warmth and a matte texture.

name: Frosted Ice Crystal
description: This high-gloss tile has a frosted look perfect for luxury bathrooms and modern interiors.

name: Antique Copper Slate
description: Earthy slate tile that shines with subtle copper reflections, perfect for living rooms or foyers.

name: Soft Beige Harmony
description: Ideal for creating a calming ambiance in any room, this tile balances warmth and neutrality.

name: Graphite Mist
description: Strong porcelain build with graphite finish – ideal for commercial floors and office spaces.

name: Sunset Blush Marble
shortDescription: Pinkish hues with a marble swirl.
description: Gorgeous marble-look tile with sunset tones that add elegance to bedrooms and bathrooms.

name: Volcanic Ash Matte
description: This matte-finish black tile gives boldness to modern interiors and is easy to maintain.

name: Olive Wood Grain
description: Captures the charm of natural wood without the maintenance – great for hallways and bedrooms.

name: Coral Cream Classic
description: A versatile tile for walls, kitchen splashbacks, or bathrooms – subtle yet stylish.

name: Cement Grey Grid
description: Popular among minimalists, this tile mimics cement with perfect uniformity and soft texture.

name: Vintage White Gloss
shortDescription: Clean white finish with a shine.
description: Ideal for backsplashes or bathroom walls, this tile reflects light and expands small spaces.

name: Amber Stone Classic
description: Rustic appeal with modern durability, perfect for walls or accent pieces in warm interiors.

name: Grey Linen Weave
description: Gives the illusion of textile with a smooth ceramic body – adds warmth to plain spaces.

name: Blush Rose Mosaic
description: Delicate pink tones and mosaic style makes it ideal for boutique bathrooms or powder rooms.
